name: Warlock of the Fiend
proficiencies: Saving Throw: WIS +4 | Saving Throw: CHA +7 | Skill: Arcana +4 | Skill: Deception +7, Perception +7, Religion +4
damage_resistances: and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks that aren't Silvered
languages: any two languages (usually Abyssal or Infernal)

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
special_abilities.desc: The warlock’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
special_abilities.desc: The warlock is a 17th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

special_abilities.name: Dark One’s Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
special_abilities.desc: When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll’s effects occur.

actions.name: Mace.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.
